title: Unit Packs Extended - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Unit Packs Extended - Europa Universalis IV mod

Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder


DESCRIPTION
UPE aims to increase the value of the cosmetic unit pack DLCs by making the premium units appear as frequently as possible, and minimise the usage of the generic vanilla units. 

They look much nicer than the vanilla units, and after all you did pay for them! 

Features
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 200 countries now using DLC unit packs - more diversity! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Level 2 Native Americans retain their unique Level 1 models but armed with muskets. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Muslim and Indian ships now used by neighbouring regions, Africa and Asia 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved dynamic colouring of some units. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Priority system to allow for any selection of unit packs. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Colonial units appear in Oceania (Australia) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ironman compatible.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Conquistadors Unit Pack 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Muslim Ships Unit Pack 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Native Americans Unit Pack 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Native Americans 2 Unit Pack 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Trade Nations Unit Pack 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Indian Subcontinent Unit Pack 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Indian Ships Unit Pack 

Future
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Future unit packs may be added 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ There may be changes to some textures to make them work better with certain countries 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compatibility with mods that add new countries (e.g. Extended Timeline) 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Any good suggestions!
